column5: This cozy bedroom apartment with cover parking space, is located just minutes away from our main central expressway, LBJ and North Dallas Tollway. You will fell like home, very well maintained, super clean. 1.5 miles from our well known Richland College, and just 13.9 miles from UTD. Dart services just around the corner. Walking distance from Walmart and Kroger. You can also experience the exclusive North Park Mall just minutes away.
